author: cnbc.com
title: What's Happening With These REIT Stocks? -- Hersha Hospitality Trust, Host Hotels & Resorts, LaSalle Hotel Properties, and RLJ Lodging Trust
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 7, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on HT, HST, LHO, and RLJ which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . Today's research on WallStEquities.com is dedicated to four companies in the Hotel and Motel REIT industry, and they are: Hersha Hospitality Trust (NYSE: HT), Host Hotels & Resorts Inc. (NYSE: HST), LaSalle Hotel Properties (NYSE: LHO), and RLJ Lodging Trust (NYSE: RLJ). Lodging REITs own and manage hotels and resorts and rent space in those properties to guests. They own different classes of hotels based on features, such as the hotels' level of service and amenities. All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below. www.wallstequities.com/registration
Hersha Hospitality Trust
On Tuesday, shares in Hersha Hospitality Trust rose slightly by 0.64%, ending the day at $17.41. The stock recorded a trading volume of 837,881 shares, which was above its three months average volume of 503,710 shares. The Company's shares are trading below their 50-day moving average by 2.14%. Moreover, shares of the Company, which owns and operates high quality upscale hotels in urban gateway markets and coastal destinations, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 38.56.
On January 16 th , 2018, Hersha Hospitality Trust announced that it will release its financial results for Q4 and full year 2017 after the market close on February 21 st , 2018. The Company will host a conference call at 9:00 a.m. ET on February 22 nd , 2018, to discuss these results. A live audio webcast of the conference call will be available on the Company's website. Get the full research report on HT for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=HT
Host Hotels & Resorts
Shares in Host Hotels & Resorts Inc. ended the day 0.36% higher at $19.42. A total volume of 11.63 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 5.94 million shares. The stock has gained 8.88% over the past year and is trading above its 200-day moving average by 2.73%. Furthermore, shares of the Company, which owns 88 properties in the United States and six properties internationally totaling approximately 52,500 rooms, have an RSI of 34.06.
On January 08 th , 2018, research firm Raymond James upgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Market Perform' to 'Outperform'.
On January 24 th , 2018, Host Hotels & Resorts announced that it will report financial results for Q4 and full year 2017 on February 21 st , 2018, after the market close. The Company will hold a conference call on February 22 nd , 2018, at 10:00 a.m. ET to discuss its 2017 results and 2018 business outlook. A simultaneous webcast of the call will be available on the Company's website. Today's complimentary research report on HST is accessible at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=HST
LaSalle Hotel Properties
On Tuesday, shares in LaSalle Hotel Properties finished 0.07% lower at $28.34. A total volume of 2.11 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 1.30 million shares. The stock has advanced 0.11% in the last month. The Company's shares are trading below their 50-day moving average by 1.81%. Additionally, shares of the Company, which owns 41 properties, which are upscale, full-service hotels, totaling approximately 10,400 guest rooms in 11 markets in seven states and the District of Columbia, have an RSI of 37.50.
On January 08 th , 2018, research firm Bank of America/ Merrill downgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Neutral' to 'Underperform'.
On January 10 th , 2018, LaSalle Hotel Properties announced that it will report financial results for Q4 2017 on February 20 th , 2018, after the market closes. The Company will conduct its quarterly conference call on February 21 st , 2018, at 11:00 a.m. ET. A live webcast of the call will be available on the Company's website. Register now for your free research document on LHO at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=LHO
RLJ Lodging Trust
RLJ Lodging Trust's shares recorded a trading volume of 1.69 million shares at the end of yesterday's session, which was above their three months average volume of 1.33 million shares. The stock closed the day 1.18% higher at $21.43. The Company's shares are trading above their 200-day moving average by 0.67%. Additionally, shares of the Company, which focuses on acquiring premium-branded, focused-service and compact full-service hotels, have an RSI of 37.98.
On January 23 rd , 2018, RLJ Lodging Trust announced that it will report financial results for Q4 and full year 2017 ended December 31 st , 2017 after the markets close on February 27 th , 2018. The Company will host a conference call on February 28 th , 2018 at 10:00 a.m. ET. Click on the link below and see our free report RLJ at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=RLJ
